description: *Calopteryx syriaca* is a species of damselfly in the family Calopterygidae known commonly as the Syrian demoiselle. This is sometimes considered to be a subspecies of *C. splendens*
distribution: It is native to the southern Levant, where it is known from Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Palestine, and Syria.
habitat: This damselfly inhabits habitat along rivers such as the Orontes, Litani, and Jordan. Its populations have declined due to loss of habitat in the river systems in the area.
